H0.text: Another name for the Holy Wars between the  Christian states of Europe against the Saracens. Crusadia

H1.text: Another name for the Holy Wars between the  Christian states of Europe against the Saracens. Sacrum Bellum

H2.text: Another name for the Holy Wars between the  Christian states of Europe against the Saracens. Christiana Militia

H3.text: Another name for the Holy Wars between the  Christian states of Europe against the Saracens. Cruzade

A7.text: Urban developed a doctrine of bellum sacrum (Christian holy war).
